__e: The property comprises 80 luxury rooms equipped with climate control, a safe, TV and a private toilet. They feature bathrooms with a shower and towels.
The apartments have free Wi-Fi and are fully equipped to make you feel at home with all the comforts
Rooms with a seating area, satellite TV, and a bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony.
The rooms feature a comfortable sitting area, desk and internet access.
